DOC.brief_summary: The study observe 28 day mortality 9 participate University base surgical intensive care unit ( SICU ) well occurrence adverse event SICU .
DOC.brief_title: The Thai Surgical Intensive Care Study ( Thai-SICU Study )
DOC.detailed_description: The adverse event include pulmonary aspiration , pulmonary embolus , drug error , new stroke , symptomatic deep vein thrombosis , pneumothorax , unplanned extubation , upper GI hemorrhage , myocardial infarction , abdominal hypertension , acute lung injury ( ALI ) /acute respiratory distress syndrome ( ARDS ) , re-intubation within 72 hour , delirium , cardiac arrest , new arrhythmia , acute kidney injury , sepsis
DOC.criteria: All SICU admission patient Age < 18 year
